thread.section_title: eTurboNews (eTN) - Original and unique global international news with a focus on travel and tourism
thread.title: Aeromexico reports July 2015 traffic results

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Aeromexico reports July 2015 traffic results
text:
Aeromexico reports July 2015 traffic results Adv: Adv: 
MEXICO CITY, Mexico - Grupo Aeromexico SAB de CV today reported July 2015 operational results. 
• Grupo Aeromexico transported 1 million 765 thousand passengers in July; a 12.0% year-on-year increase. International passenger numbers increased by 17.1%, while domestic passenger numbers increased by 9.4%. 
• Demand, measured in Revenue Passenger Kilometers (RPKs), increased by 13.0%, year-on-year. Aeromexico's capacity, measured in Available Seat Kilometers (ASKs), increased by 8.9% year-on-year. 
• Aeromexico's July load factor was 87.2%. 
July YTD July 2015 2014 Var 2015 2014 Var 
RPKs (itinerary + charter, millions) Domestic 1,023 930 10.0% 6,319 5,930 6.6% International 2,056 1,795 14.6% 12,229 10,618 15.2% Total 3,079 2,725 13.0% 18,548 16,548 12.1% 
ASKs (itinerary + charter, millions) Domestic 1,208 1,140 5.9% 8,094 7,614 6.3% International 2,329 2,108 10.5% 15,171 13,143 15.4% Total 3,537 3,248 8.9% 23,266 20,757 12.1% 
Load Factor (itinerary, %) p.p. p.p. Domestic 84.8 81.8 3.0 78.2 78.1 0.1 International 88.5 86.1 2.3 80.8 81.4 -0.6 Total 87.2 84.6 2.6 79.9 80.1 -0.3 
Passengers (itinerary + charter, thousands) Domestic 1,145 1,047 9.4% 7,282 6,795 7.2% International 619 529 17.1% 3,592 3,067 17.1% Total 1,765 1,575 12.0% 10,874 9,862 10.3% 
Figures may not sum to total due to rounding.
